body: So im back but not just yet recently well near end of may I decided to get rid of my pc for a while so I could concentrate on my exams and to be honest it felt great sadly my parents are now using my no pc thing to blackmail me into doing other stuff but I decided that im going to reconnect to the minecraft world but for now only on teamspeak and forums and also I had some account problems with being hacked and mojang tell me to change everything so that was fun but im back yayay but of course no one will care of course but for those people out there hey im back.

title: I'm back (if anyone missed me)
